div.h3: Royster Middle School

div.h4: Food Service delivery and pickup continues
div.p: Governor Kelly's stay-at-home order will not alter the delivery to rural students nor the pickup of grab-and -go meals from in-town bus stop locations, Chanute Elementary or Royster Middle School.

School buildings will be closed for the remainder of the school year and all athletics and activities are cancelled. Classwork and instruction will continue online through the district's Continuous Education Plan, found beneath the Parents Tab on the district site, by clicking on COVID-19.
